title: NA-22 (Mardan-III)
text:
NA-22 (Mardan-III) () is a constituency for the <a href="National%20Assembly%20of%20Pakistan">National Assembly</a> of <a href="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>. The constituency was formerly known as NA-10 (Mardan-II) from 1977 to 2018. The name changed to NA-22 (Mardan-III) after the delimitation in 2018.
Elections since 2002.
2002 general election.
"A total of 1,713 votes were rejected."
2008 general election.
"A total of 2,928 votes were rejected."
2013 general election.
"A total of 4,834 votes were rejected."
2018 general election.
General elections were held on 25 July 2018.
